lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: It is the least I can do to help fight poverty worldwide. Because charity is all very well, but only temporary relief. These microcredits are long-term help: you help people set their own business and become economically independent. Because everybody deserves a chance and it's a shame that so many millions of people will never have one because they lack access to capital for an initial investment. Because I want to be the change I want to see in the world.

lender.name: Ozy
lender.loan_because: we are given blessings in life that we should pass on.
lender.occupational_info: I work in television taping programs from the satellite.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and leave a legacy that lasts after I am gone. I believe that money is not everything but it can change everything. I am a follower of Jesus Christ and He gave it all so that I can be free to give.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: I like to make life a little bit easier for those that need it.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it's more than a handout. It's empowering people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a government department that assists people with disabilities with managing their finances.

lender.name: Vijay
lender.loan_because: Its really hard time for me. Here in india, day by day we r suffering from cost rais. Life became costy. Emplyment doesnt work to fulfil daily life requirement here. Want to do software bussiness for that i would like to buy some resources for which i am not capable. So want a loan. I have diffrent conecpts to on which i have to work to make softwares. i.e. profit tracking system etc. I will offord free copy of my one useful daily expense tracking software to those who helps me in this task.
lender.occupational_info: information technilogy

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: It's lovely to see the person and know the story behind the request and I feel empowered by being able to select the person I loan to.

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: God has blessed and provided for me so I can bless and help others. Deuteronomy 15:6 When the Lord your God blesses you as He promised you, then you shall lend to many nations, but you shall not borrow.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of elderly people so they can remain in their own homes as long as possible.

lender.name: Zalvina
lender.loan_because: There are many things about this world that I would change, but changing the world is no easy task and certainly not something that can be accomplished by any single person. I figure that together with a group of likeminded individuals who all share the same vision of a better world in which all people can live harmoniously, happily and most importantly, equally, we trully can create positive change in the world; one loan at a time!

lender.name: miranda
lender.loan_because: It's fun! "Be the change you want to see in the world..." Ghandi
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse...

lender.name: Frans
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who try to get a better life by starting their own business

lender.name: Kylie
lender.loan_because: Empowerment is so important!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Trainer Manager.

lender.name: Norm & Dee
lender.loan_because: God has been very good to us, giving us opportunity to work and enjoy raising a family. We would like to share some of our money to help others to help themselves and their family to live a good life together.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I no longer "work" for a living. We are "retired". Much of our time is spent helping others in Australia.

lender.name: Denice & Martin
lender.loan_because: We both enjoy helping others and seeing how working together can do so much good.
lender.occupational_info:
Denice is involved in sales of collectables and Vintage Clothing
Martin is a Computer Tech and manufactures Aircraft Radio Antenna Systems for ultralight Aircraft. Black Widow TT2000 as seen in the web link.

lender.name: Khoder Farhat
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good that I can make a difference. I don't make too much money but enough to be able to help someone else no matter how small my donation is.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a taxi driver. I don't have to describe my work too much. All taxi drivers around the world do practically the same thing. :)

lender.name: jane
lender.loan_because: I'm doing this for selfish reasons...it feels good. I'm sure it makes the entrepreneur proud to repay the loan and it gives me great pleasure to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a stay at home mum of 3. I work from home for my husband's welding business doing all the bookkeeping.

lender.name: kym
lender.loan_because: Kiva is such an awesome tool to assist other small business owners world wide. We can make a difference one loan at a time.

lender.name: The Tsangs
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to help lift the women of the world out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of a precious 8-week-old girl and I take joy in helping her learn about her new world.

lender.name: Kandice
lender.loan_because: As an artist, I know how hard it is even in the best of circumstances to build and maintain a business for yourself. I can't even image trying to do it with the circumstances the people here are experiencing. I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I make beads out of glass with a torch, using a technique called lampworking.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: My "Mimi" (grandmother) gave me this as a gift for last Christmas ( to help me learn), and I like helping people! I am lucky to have as much as I do, and want to help others to have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, play, learn and grow. I love my Mom, Dad and my cat Bailey. I love to dance and sing, play piano and draw pictures.

lender.name: Sabine
lender.loan_because: I'm a single mum and I know how hard life can be!

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe each person can make a positive difference in the life of others and in their own life.
lender.occupational_info: I listen to people dealing with issues in their life and work with them to find ways through their problems.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: I am inspired to giving a handup rather than a handout. This is one way of making a difference in the world. I love the idea!
lender.occupational_info: I work at "Curves" a women's only fitness and weight loss Centre.

lender.name: Michal
lender.loan_because: I know that banks' conditions are very hard so this is the way how to start the small business.

lender.name: Janna
lender.loan_because: between us all, we can truly make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I do fundraising and financial work for a non-profit land conservation organization.

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: To help women improve their lives and those of their children.

lender.name: Wiebke
lender.loan_because: I do believe it makes a difference.

lender.name: Jaye
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: This is a great idea to get the money to the people who need it

lender.name: jenny and simon
lender.loan_because: help other in need for it may be you one day.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I heard how this organisation helped 3rd world countries and it appealed to me that you help others help themselves.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I think the strength & future of our world lies in the efforts & courage of these entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I work at growing awareness in our community about the International School of Minnesota. I believe education will be the salvation of us all.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: it's a fantastic way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work on an ambulance helping sick people

lender.name: johanna
lender.loan_because: Helping someone else always helps me.
lender.occupational_info: I melt colorful glass rods and form beads with pure silver accents. I have an organic southwest feel in my work.

lender.name: Danijela
lender.loan_because: i want to help...

lender.name: Dee-Ann & Greg
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to live a life where we have everything we need and most of what we want. Not everyone is so lucky.

lender.name: Gina - Yarrawonga
lender.loan_because:
It's nice to feel that someone I will never meet, benefits from the little I can do.
I also love the idea that the same amount of money can help others when repaid.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: "The only thing that counts is faith expressing itself through love." Galatians 5:6
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor and I work mostly with teenagers.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: My mother put up her house to get me started in life with a business of my own. So i am paying it forward... what goes around comes around so to speak
lender.occupational_info: I sell natural cosmetics and pure essential oils and also work in the field of natural therapies. I also do psychic readings

lender.name: Lizzie
lender.loan_because: The gift of giving is one of the greatest gifts I can give myself!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a consultant for a small town planning and development company. The company assists invidivuals, companies and government sector with matters concerning landuse planning.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I like to see real change in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: The opportunity to provide an entrepreneur with no access to capital or hope, with both is a deal I can not pass up.
lender.occupational_info: I perform both corporate acquisitions and engage in long-range planning for my company.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want people to experience hope in places that were previously without it.
lender.occupational_info: I help tell people in my town about our community events and causes. I help to raise awareness for charities and the arts.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I think it is very important for people all over the world to be able to start their own business!!

lender.name: Karen Marie
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves and their family, so that children kan go to school.

lender.name: Karin
lender.whereabouts: Puerto de la Cruz Santa Cruz de Tenerife

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I'm a huge advocate of giving back to the greater community and this is another way to make an impact. It's not just about taking advantage of what the world can provide in the present - it's about preserving and enhancing it for the future!

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Ric
lender.loan_because: I enjoy reading the stories, and then helping others achieve their dreams. They inspire me with their business ideas and desire to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a business that uses seismic exploration methods to locate oil & gas.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: It is time we all make an effort to give back to those in need. It lets the sunshine back in between your ears. Thank you Kiva for this unique format to be Givers.

lender.name: Christer
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Kloriece
lender.occupation: Sell my arts and crafts online
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with enough money that my family is secure and I wish everyone could be safe and secure. This in my effort to help this happen.
lender.occupational_info: I create items from discarded clothing, paint on reclaimed paper, knit and crochet with scrap yarn in an effort to keep items in use instead of thrown away. My mother used to say, "Waste not, want not."

lender.name: Jodi Schoenauer
lender.loan_because: Philanthropy is central to a good life and well being. It benefits the doner far more then the recipent
lender.occupational_info: I help raise money for different charities. I also went on a mission to Peru where we did surgery on 114 children with facial deformities.

lender.name: Neelley
lender.loan_because: I want to help people use their skills so that they become role models to others in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I'm part of a program that helps United Methodists think about ways they can change the world by building community locally & fighting malaria globally.

lender.name: Moberly School
lender.loan_because: We are grade sevens who want to help people all over the > world because we come from all over the world, too

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I want to be the change I wish to see in the world

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: The bread which you withhold belongs to the hungry; the clothing you shut away, to the naked; and the money you bury in the earth is the redemption and freedom of the penniless. -Thomas Aquinas

lender.name: Winston and Tina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world. Every one deserves the chance to earn the dream, if they are willing to work for it. If you can dream it, you can achieve it

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: it is important to give back to the world around me.
lender.occupational_info: i work in a cancer research institute assisting the doctors with administrative tasks

lender.name: Larissa
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I build web sites.

lender.name: norma
lender.loan_because: I believe giving is a social responsibility that lifts all of us up.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children aged 9 and 10 how to read, write and do math and art. I hope that I teach them to be citizens of the world.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate to have the quality of life that I do. I lend because I wish to help others achieve a higher quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer animation and visual effects.

lender.name: Ralph, Mizuho & Fina
lender.loan_because: the world has to change. This is one way we can help doing it.

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to help and I love the idea of Kiva :-)

lender.name: Pelto family
lender.loan_because: We want to help people be happy.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a truck and deliver packages, and my wife takes care of our home and children. Our children do well in school, so we hope they will have good jobs when they are grown.

lender.name: Nigel
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make it.

lender.name: axel
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Carri
lender.loan_because: 1) Redistribution of wealth/knowledge to aid those who request it is important for me 2) Kiva provides an efficient way to participate in a global grassroots societal self-help initiative 3) It solves my utility maximization problem :)

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It's the best I can do right now.
lender.occupational_info: Studying for medical school

lender.name: Rex Boni
lender.loan_because: Beggars who walk, princes and queens who ride, in skull-and-bone land saunter side-by-side. Equality. Ob arm ob reich im Tode gleich.

lender.name: Frédéric
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good way to help people by developing job and activity.

lender.name: Arne
lender.loan_because: It's an investment in the future
lender.occupational_info: Office work, I develop web sites based on a CMS

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: J'étais un volontaire de corps de la paix au Benin et je voudrais aider les gens là-bas. I was a Peace Corps volunteer in Benin and I would like to help the people there.

lender.name: Dave Galliguez
lender.loan_because: I read "Banker to the Poor" and believe in micro-lending.
lender.occupational_info: I create links...

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because:
To quote Antoine de Saint Exupery "If you want to build a ship, don't drum up the men to gather wood, divide the work and give orders. Instead, teach them to yearn for the vast and endless sea..."
I truly believe that it is essential for the people of this world to work together,in order to bring about any positive change. Our help not only enables but also encourages people to help themselves.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I believe by giving entrepeneurs a leg up rather than a hand out they have a vested interest to make a difference and with our help they will!
lender.occupational_info: I work in Education for Sustainable Development and I manage a Field Centre. I have spent 32 years in education working as a Biologist teaching environment education to teachers and students all ages.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: Grow your business and you will succeed! Stop growing and you will become dormant! I help because I know how hard it is to run a small business and succeed.Keep on growing Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I have a small cleaning business.I also film and write about my travels to Asia.

lender.name: John and Leanne
lender.loan_because: There are so many people in the world who don't have the opportunities that we take for granted in Australia. Every Australian has the chance to "make a go of it". That is simply not the case in so many other countries.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with the ability and support in order to get a good education and a good job. Many other people could do what I do if they had the resources I do, but they can't because of circumstances out of their control. I want to share what God has given me with others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to be an actuary. Actuaries look at information about losses in the past in order to predict what losses will be in the future. This is so insurance companies can make sure they charge the right price for insurance and set aside enough money to be able to pay for all of the future claims.

lender.name: Nitesh
lender.loan_because: I studied economics and journalism in college -- through that I discovered microlending.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Chicago-based Internet news company.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: it's 100x better than the sting of buyer's remorse after buying something that doesn't really benefit anyone. That and I like to feel that I'm helping someone reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a union that ensures that actors receive adequate compensation for the work they do.

lender.name: Sean Taylor
lender.loan_because: I want to help rural and poor communities grow and thrive, eventually becoming integral players in the world economy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager who oversees construction of special effects for movies and television. We make fake dead bodies, monster and alien makeups, mechanical animals and monsters, etc.

lender.name: André
lender.loan_because: I believe lending is the best way to help people.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Logan
lender.loan_because: interdependence is the reality of our life.

lender.name: Agnieszka
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the life of someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the US Navy as an Human Resources Specialist, I look at the duties of the job descriptions of the people we hire and determine how much money the jobs are worth and why.

lender.name: Marcet and Donald
lender.loan_because: We would like to pay it forward,
lender.occupational_info: Work Customer Service, Finance, Collection, Tech Support, Contracts.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I love giving to others!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in fifth grade. My school is clean and safe. I do a lot of fun stuff there.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I try to do good and be just

lender.name: melissa
lender.loan_because: My best friend is a loaner and I want to help someone succeed in life with some help that I can financially provide.
lender.occupational_info: I help people save money.

lender.name: Tylee
lender.loan_because: I can. I like that I can help someone to be successful and look after their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am about to enter the 5th grade in September 2009. I work hard at school and get good grades. I play soccer in the summer and am part of a Cub Scout group.

lender.name: sean ( Australia )
lender.loan_because: l believe everyone needs a chance at a better life, and to have a smile on there faces....
lender.occupational_info: my work involves fast food in Queensland Australia

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: I know how good it feels to receive help when you need it.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to feel happy and balanced in themselves, through acupuncture and psychic healing; it's a form of shamanism.

lender.name: kylie
lender.loan_because: Lending money through this site allows me, with little effort, to help others in big ways.Its so easy, microfinancing is so important, and why wouldn't you?

lender.name: TamboDragonFruit
lender.loan_because: Life without Love is not worth living.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I wish to make a positive difference in other people's lives and KIVA has made it so simple!
lender.occupational_info: I have the best "job" in the world... Iwork with the most "at risk" young people in the Hunter Valley NSW assisting them in making a successful transition from school to work.

lender.name: MGB
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is poor entrepeneurs only access to financing and it gives families a chance to do better for themselves and their children.

lender.name: Helene
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a school that has 1200 students.

lender.name: dslunsford1
lender.loan_because: God has so richly blessed us that we are honored to bless others. It's amazing to think about how much money we waste in a "developed" nation, whereas a month's worth of pocket change could revitalize someone's life. To God be the Glory, great things He hath done.(Luke 7:41-43)
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and my wife is a doctor.

lender.name: lucy & simon
lender.loan_because: We love to be able to make a difference in peoples lives and we believe helping them with a business loan changes lives forever.
lender.occupational_info: I look after our beautiful twin baby boys and Simon fixes aircraft in the Air force

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I love to see people become financially independent and I want to share some of my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a financial services firm helping people plan and save for retirement.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Why not? :-P

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good about myself! I have a system where I buy other people's useless stuff in garage sales, sell it on ebay and then give all the money to Kiva. Capitalism is a vicious circle!
lender.occupational_info: You can't eat them but flowers are very good for the soul.

lender.name: Mandi
lender.loan_because: because i can.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to stay connected to people and help others in need.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: yessi
lender.loan_because: I am a college's student in Indonesia, I need money to make a small shop, I just need $1000. Please lend me money, and I promise to you all to back your money in some month. Please contact me on my email in Yezz_2408@yahoo.com. thanks before
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student who do not have much money to start entrepreneurship.

lender.loan_because:

lender.name: P.U.G.S
lender.loan_because: We recognize that luck and circumstance have a lot to do with success and that sometimes a helping hand can be the tipping point for those in need. We believe that it is a privilege to give and hope that our small contributions can make a lasting impact in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of girlfriends in Toronto, Canada, who like to get together to indulge as well as give back.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do and if every single person in developed countries did the world would not know hunger and poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work three days a week for a large private company in administration. The remainder of the week I spent with my small daughter caring for her.

lender.name: Hayley
lender.occupational_info: If someone has an enquiry or a problem, it is my job to help them.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I want to try to help people less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Act as a technical expert for sales people.

lender.name: Chookie
lender.loan_because: We are all put on earth to help each other.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: there is no reason not to

lender.name: Gene
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help others achieve their goals and dreams. We can do so much with small amounts of money.
lender.occupational_info: I look for businesses listed on the stock exchange that are profitable and buy small pieces of them, hoping they will go up in value.

lender.name: Nyree and Martin
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate people and want to share what we can with those wanting to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: kris
lender.loan_because: I love the fact that I can reach out and help change someone's life. I value the oppurtunity to give something back to the (global) community.
lender.occupational_info: Every year, I have the opportunity to teach hundreds of students the skills they require to be engineers. In particular, I specialize in teaching within the fields of Mechanical Engineering and Aerospace Engineering. In addition, my job allows me to conduct research into these fields.

lender.name: Steph
lender.loan_because: it's a little way i can help someone who doesn't have as much as i do. I also think it is important for my sons to learn the importance of helping and giving.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and look after my 2 sons. I also study two days a week to be a florist. I'm hoping that by next year i will be qualified to get a good job to support my kids.

lender.name: Juergen
lender.loan_because: Be the change you want to see in the world
lender.occupational_info: Head of product management (IT infrastructure service provider)

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I love

lender.name: Shayne
lender.loan_because: I don't loan to charities because I am never sure how much gets to the needy. In this way I can track how my money is being put to good use and see the results first hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Government paying pension payments to the elderly.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I think this the best Idea I have ever heard of.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the elderly in their everyday living

lender.name: carolyn
lender.loan_because: I hope that the people I lend to will have a better life through my loan
lender.occupational_info: beef cattle farmer

lender.name: Joao
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. The gap between countries and opportunities is so vast that the money we lend doesn't change our material lives in any way, but gives the opportunity for someone else to survive. That idea alone is daunting and begs the question: Why doesn't everyone who can, do it as well?
lender.occupational_info: I teach English and Portuguese, sometimes children, sometimes adults. The passing on of knowledge is the greatest gift you can ever give, and it's free.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I was given a hand up when I needed it. I love the concept of using my small amount to help those who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to buy and sell houses.

lender.name: Brennan
lender.loan_because:
"Where you live in the world shouldn't determine whether you live".
There are people who are determined to make their lives better, we can help them and it's free!
I have the ability to give people on the other side of the world a chance to achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of making a difference to a world that is at times so harsh to some.
lender.occupational_info: Occupational Health and safety, Keeping people safe.

lender.name: Kerrie&Jerome
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance in life..

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software.

lender.name: Gareth
lender.occupational_info: Saving up to move to Tokyo

lender.name: Mona-Lisa
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I love to help people live the lives they want, day-by-day. I hope the loans make a different in their lives in a very positive way.
lender.occupational_info: In my job I teach people how to use their minds to create their lives and make the most out of their world. I hope I insprie a message that helps people know that anything is possible!

lender.name: Polly
lender.loan_because:
I think it is one of the most effective ways to alleviate poverty and empower women.
The photo is of myself and Usha Shrestha, a Kiva borrower who runs a small sweet shop selling traditional Newari deserts and Indian samosas in Nepal.
lender.occupational_info: I am part way through a Masters of Development Studies at university and, in Australia, I worked in community development. I am currently based in Nepal as a Kiva Fellow.

lender.name: Antje
lender.loan_because: the world must become better

lender.name: Chris Young
lender.loan_because: I would love to be able to make a difference in people's lives and also because I'm incredibly selfish and it makes me feel good!!!
lender.occupational_info: Just an ordinary parent that loves her family and is so appreciative to be so blessed!!!!

lender.name: Anne & Roman
lender.loan_because: We can potentially make a huge difference in peoples lives with such a small effort on our part
lender.occupational_info: Roman is an electrical engineer specialising in industrial automation and Anne is a professional musician, actor and teacher.

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: I think micro-loans are a great solution
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures and make movies.

lender.name: Caryn
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by people wanting to help themselves and their families live better lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with college students and help guide them through the sea of choices facing them in their academic and personal lives.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: Money makes the world go round? Well, not necessarily! But initiatives like Kiva might help to bring the world a little bit more into balance.

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: I like the concept of helping someone to help themselves. Kiva seems to be a help up and not a hand out. I am not against giving to charities, as I do , but this concept has the ability to make a lasting difference to someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I attend to emergencies, fires, incidents and medical calls. I work in Ringwood, a suburb of Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I can and it all leads to partnerships that create positive world change.
lender.occupational_info: Promoting partnerships with youth and adults in my county to help create positive community change.

lender.name: Usch
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving others a chance.
lender.occupational_info: wife, mother and grandmother to 11

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: Life is really great to me. I think it is so wonderful to help someone on another continent to reach their business and financial dreams.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: Micro financing empowers entrepreneurial people
lender.occupational_info: Corporate banker in the Netherlands

lender.name: Bettina, Anna & Felix
lender.loan_because: I think it's a perfect idea to join many people from different countries, so that they come together to help someone in a very usefull way!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a socialworker.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: People have dreams.

lender.name: Dan and Barb
lender.loan_because: Barb and I enjoy traveling the world and learning about other cultures. We also enjoy helping others make a difference in their own lives and hopefully they can then reach out to others. Spreading the wealth both monitarily and spiritually.
lender.occupational_info: Environmental consulting

lender.name: Aurora
lender.loan_because: I have been on the other side. Sometimes you need help and there is no one out there. Now I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I guide women to transform their relationship to money to manifest the life they desire and deserve

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I would love to see my money going to make a difference in somebody's life.

lender.name: Web_Imp
lender.loan_because: Had circumstances been different, this could be me. I am thankful for what I have, and the ability to share.

lender.name: Jess
lender.occupational_info: I care for sick children

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: it gives people hope.
lender.occupational_info: I am a production manager for t-shirts.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I care about the poor. I follow Jesus, and I believe that he's be doing the same thing that Kiva.org is.
lender.occupational_info: I write music for films and documentaries. The latest film that my team finished exposed sex trafficking and human slavery in Cambodia.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: -- as the song says -- "money makes the world go round!" Also, many people have helped me in my business and personal endeavors, and I want to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I advocate for women and children's health using my communications, media, fundraising, teaching and doula skills.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Because I can. $25 is so easy to spend without even thinking about it, every day, but to other people on the other side of the globe, it means the world. I like the fact that I can help without having to rely on our government to do it on our behalf.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a surgical nurse, so I look after patients after they have had operations. I am learning to love it! :)

lender.name: Kori
lender.loan_because: I love the practice of micro-loans where a few dollars can have a profound impact on the quality of life of the person receiving the loan.
lender.occupational_info: I try to get people to stop using paper processes and do those processes on line.

lender.name: theary
lender.loan_because:
I grew up in Cambodia and I know how hard it was after the Khmer Rouge killed most of my family members. I still have a sister who lives in Pursat. Twelve family members and only two survived!
God bless Cambodian people!

lender.name: James
lender.occupational_info: Writer

lender.name: Tommy
lender.loan_because: Maybe I can help
lender.occupational_info: I sell A/C parts

lender.name: Barbara
lender.occupation: travel agent. Want to be a painter.
lender.loan_because: I want to help a bit. I wish I could do more.

lender.name: Greenberg Family
lender.loan_because: We have traveled in several under-developed countries throughout the world, and giving through kiva allows us to show our gratitude for the generosity that we have experienced in so many communities. We also find that kiva teaches our children the joy and excitement of giving.

lender.name: Ulrike
lender.loan_because: I´m convinced by the idea of Kiva and because I want to share with those who need it
lender.occupational_info: I`m working with children who need help with the german language

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I
lender.occupational_info: I borrow money from banks for a very large corporation

lender.name: Regine
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people without bureaucratism. I want to give them a new chance for a better life.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I feel the world needs a better sense of community and responsibility and by loanning I think I can do my little part to facilitate that.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: What a strange world it is where the clicks of my laptop keys give an opportunity to others

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: is the obligation of every human being to help each other
lender.occupational_info: I work in the world of Computer Science. I work on a Postal Company called CTT Correios de Portugal, and my tasks go from Programming, Functional Analysis, Technical Design and Project Management.

lender.name: Marti
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to try to raise a family as a single woman; and I know how banks treat people with no money.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct research to find major donors for an educational institution.

lender.name: D & B
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help others.

lender.name: Brian N
lender.loan_because: Being poor sucks.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand one another so they do what they meant to.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: Ich verleihe gern, weil ich dankbar bin dass es uns gut geht und ich möchte das es anderen Menschen auch so geht.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I love to help people.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to help people in the world to make their life a little bit better!
lender.occupational_info: I work for smaller companies consulting and helping them in all marketing matters, also building up websites and do online marketing.

lender.name: Bill SEIDL
lender.loan_because: Feeling concern...( )
lender.occupational_info: ceo & founder TagsOff™ & Biotecmart™

lender.name: Nick Boldt
lender.loan_because: Empowerment though responsibility is much more effective than charity.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I want to help others & KIVA is a great way to do it

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: A little bit from me can make a big difference to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I build mathematical and computer models to help people make better decisions.

lender.name: Trent
lender.loan_because: I like to give a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I tell stories and share knowledge to help others navigate life.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to support their family
lender.occupational_info: I make photos of things people want to sell.

lender.name: Jhambala
lender.loan_because: Allowing people to help themselves is the best way to give!
lender.occupational_info: Matt works in a healthcare company developing new business opportunities. Sacha helps people to create change in their lives through business and personal coaching.

lender.name: Adam
lender.occupational_info: I am studying education policy. Education is power.

lender.name: Deana
lender.loan_because: I recall how hard it was for me to get a job after I finished school. No one would give me a job because I lacked experience, but I couldn't gain the experience because I didn't have any. I knew I was more than capable of performing the work I do now, but without being given the opportunity to do so I would not be able to prove myself. These entrepreneurs across the globe need that opportunity to prove themselves and we are here to provide the resources they lack.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because:
My friend Kristin showed me the way...
I've traveled the world extensively and have seen first hand the potential micro-loans can have on people.

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: It's exciting to see what other people can do with their loans.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze food for pesticide residues.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: its a way to give back and make the world a better place in some small way

lender.name: Anna Anthony and Oscar
lender.loan_because: We know we are very privileged to support others, as God has supported us, and continues to bless us.
lender.occupational_info: Anna assists people to look and feel their very best. Anthony provides quality assurance to websites and software like this one. Oscar, our cat, supports us emotionally.

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to reach many people in all parts of the globe. I loan because I want to help in any way that I can.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I feel like it's the least that i can do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently studying Philosophy with a specialization in Ethical and Moral Philosophy. Basically, I'm attempting to grasp what it means to be a responsible and good human being in our secular world. At the end of the day, I just want to be able to say that I've helped someone and that maybe, just maybe, I've made the world a better place.

lender.name: Quoc-Anh
lender.loan_because: microfinance works.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university.

lender.name: David & Sarah
lender.loan_because: we can, and because $25 makes such a big difference in these entrepreneurs' lives.
lender.occupational_info: David is a family doctor. Sarah helps run the office. We have two adult sons.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is the future and in order to be both prosperous and sustainable we have to break down barriers between countries and all help each other.

lender.name: Bernice
lender.loan_because: As a single mum of 6 for the last 13 yrs I am on a limited income but still have so much more than many of these people. Between us we sponsor 7 children through Compassion and 1 through World Vision, and this is just another way we can recognise how fortunate we are living here in Australia. I am gradually adding to my loan amount.
lender.occupational_info: I work in schools helping children to learn and enjoy life. I am currently studying full time to get my Bachelor of Education as although I have working in schools for 30 years I do not have an official qualification. I am attempting to remedy that. I still work 3 mornings and 2 afternoons in two different schools and try to fit uni lectures and homework and housework and kids around that. Not always successfully.

lender.name: Doug, Jenny, K & L
lender.loan_because: It's recyclable... and hopefully contagious!
lender.occupational_info: I research investments and my wife is a doctor (of kids and babies)

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I like to help people succeed in fullfilling their goals. It's a great blessing to be able to be share in anothers dreams and success.
lender.occupational_info: Basically I clean and do some driving of light rail trains which people ride on to get around our city.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is empowering

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: It is an honour to be able to help hard-working people help themselves.

lender.name: Jacqui
lender.loan_because: Because I can't change the world, but I can make a big difference in someone less fortunate's life by helping them to help themselves.

lender.name: Perla
lender.loan_because:
I want to help make a diference in someone's life. I once was a struggling entrepreneur myself and know about how tough it can be. These people do it a lot harder than I ever did
Quiero ayudar a diferenciar en la vidas de jente. Era una vez empresario luchador mismo y sé sobre cómo es resistente puede ser. Esta gente lo hace mucho más difícilmente que lo hice antes.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: that´s a small step for a man ...
lender.occupational_info: teach children

lender.name: Gaby & Friedrich
lender.loan_because: we can. This is a very good possibility for the assistence for self-helping of other, poorer people in the whole world.
lender.occupational_info: We are married since 1976 and have two children, Kersten and Leona. We live in a small village in the "Hunsrück", a low moutain range in Germany.

lender.name: Maree
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky in my travels to see first hand how proud and friendly people with very little are and how hard they strive to improve their lives and their families lives.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: i want to give back something

lender.name: Magda
lender.loan_because: I like helping people and I know when I will be need help yhey hepl me too .

lender.name: Gitta
lender.loan_because: I like this idea to help people
lender.occupational_info: I´m working for ABB an I make technical drawings which shows how to build the electrical things of powers stations all over the world

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Aidan & Dilyn
lender.loan_because: Every week, we set aside part of our allowances to "share" with others. We may only be 12 and 8 years old, but we like to see how we can help other people achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Jérôme
lender.loan_because: I admire the spirit of enterprise these people have and hope that their standard of living will increase through the investments that are made possible by the loan.

lender.name: Ralph and Jenny
lender.loan_because: Our lives have been blessed. We want to give someone the opportunity to expand their lives, too, through the development of a successful business.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: Its great to be able to give back to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Hectic but rewarding.

lender.name: Maret
lender.loan_because: I believe money should be used. To do things.

lender.name: lisanne
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should deserve the right to make a go of things in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: My twin sister and I are dog groomers and we work for ourselves from home. :):) We love animals and what we do!

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I manage 425 volunteers in a large hospital in a large city in Queensland, Australia. It's a rewarding but often challenging job!

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: It gives me immense gratification to know that i'am able to make a real difference in somebody's life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a University student currently studying in the area of health sciences.

lender.name: Nacho
lender.loan_because: The end of poverty is not only a dream

lender.name: SiteStories: web media
lender.loan_because: I believe in the value and power of micro-finance.
lender.occupational_info: SiteStories creates audio and video programming for the web. We create media for clients, and also develop original shows for syndication across the web.

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: so little to us(the equivalent of a meal out) means a phenomenal change to the lives of others
lender.occupational_info: visit friends,story times at the library and stay at home to raise, teach, guide, kiss, cuddle, learn from and love my children.

lender.name: Catherine & Jack
lender.loan_because: We hope our loans will make a real difference to someone's life. Love telling people about this! It's addictive..
lender.occupational_info: We own two businesses , but the main one is to help operating businesses keep their records to show if they are operating a profit and are therefore succesful.

lender.name: Joachin Family
lender.loan_because: We want others to have the chance to make life better for themselves and their families. Small actions can make a difference and help build a world that works for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: Danilo is a Procurement Consultant purchasing IT equipment and services for government. Tammy manages Organisational Development in a state government agency.

lender.name: ROSEMARY
lender.loan_because: i wanted to upgrage my business and because of my clients that are demanding for better service each day without me providing them because of funds
lender.occupational_info: well i do try my best to meet up except that i dont have much funds

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I like to help those who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I assist construction team in doing their work.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it.

lender.name: David & Jodi
lender.loan_because: our family has a full and rich life. We say...Pay it forward.

lender.name: Bobbie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to have the support of my friends and family. I believe that I can help other people develop new skills through lending. As their business improves, so will their quality of life and the lives of people around them.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working on a master's degree in software engineering.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because:
Is the rich world aware of how four billion of the six billion live? If we were aware, we would want to help out, we'd want to get involved. "Bill Gates"
Charity is a supreme virtue, and the great channel through which the mercy of God is passed on to mankind. It is the virtue that unites men and inspires their noblest efforts. "Conrad Hilton"

lender.name: Matt and Melissa
lender.loan_because: We realize that we are very fortunate people and think that others should have as many opportunities as we do.
lender.occupational_info: Matt works at a bank and Melissa works for an organization that is fighting to stop global warming.

lender.name: Caspar
lender.loan_because: In 2003, I had setup my own business, which I later sold after running it for eight years. Through micro-finance loans, I wish more people, particularly from developing economies, to share in the experience of building something on your own and developing it into something that can benefit your community around you.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Sales for an international Internet company, where we help to bring merchants together with their users and customers.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is not "right" to give money for nothing. I do not want to see cycles of dependency, but rather, cycles of responsibility, and confidence.
lender.occupational_info: I work with organizations to build their capacities to not just grow, but to develop. I work across sectors and take a strong stance on social responsibility.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: There is joy in giving.
lender.occupational_info: Consultant

lender.name: Tarin
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Buck
lender.loan_because: I love others and want to give to them. Luke 6:38, "Give and it shall be given unto you, good measure, pressed down, shaken together, and running over shall men give unto your bosom.For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again."
lender.occupational_info: I write magazine articles and books.

lender.name: Elisabet
lender.loan_because: it's needed and a great investment.

lender.name: Manuel & Angelika
lender.loan_because: We're fortunate to be able to.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can, and I should.
lender.occupational_info: I study Education in Minnesota.

lender.name: cathleen
lender.loan_because: I have faced some personal difficulties raising 4 children on my own so I have empathy for others less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I worked in Radio & TV for 25 years writing, producing and directing commercials. I now do a little desktop publishing from home

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: My husband saw this on the Oprah Winfrey web page. He inspired me to help others and to make a difference. He's the best!
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand and learn about the medications they are taking.

lender.name: zander
lender.loan_because: It's a good cause that helps keep me down to earth.

lender.name: Ragagli Family
lender.loan_because: My kids and I loan because what is a small scarifice for us can be a significant impact for another person. My kids are learning about giving as well as making a "virtual" connection with another part of the world.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I know there are people who need nothing more than an opportunity and someone who believes in them to achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help create medical products that will be used in hospitals.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I shelve books at the local library.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good way to support entrepreneurship in the developing countries.

lender.name: Aubrey Karen Acy Kaylan
lender.loan_because: I want to share my opportunities and teach my girls the same. We raise peppers in our garden and then dry, crush and bottle the blend for friends. So many people tried to pay us for it, that we decided to donate proceeds directly to Kiva to help a fellow farmer!
lender.occupational_info: We run a brewpub, manage 2 family rental houses, a garden and raise our 2 girls on the Outer Banks of North Carolina.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the film and television industry.

lender.name: Kristy
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world become a better place.

lender.name: Sallye
lender.loan_because: I just read the Book Three Cups of Tea and am so moved by the work that Greg Mortensen has and is doing. I also think that one person really can make a difference in the world. This is one step for me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a labor and delivery nurse.

lender.name: Lorane
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I speak to the public about how to access their inner strength and to connect with spirit.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: i feel ambivalent about my wealth in a poor world, and should feel ambivalent.

lender.name: Muffett
lender.loan_because: It's something I can do to help someone else in the world have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a craftsperson.

lender.name: Duarte
lender.occupational_info: Capacity building and indigenous development through host community involvement in tourism

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: People can be best helped by helping themselves. Goverments often keep aid for selfish purposes.
lender.occupational_info: Repair electrical equipment that breaks down in a large manufacturing plant.

lender.name: Manfred
lender.loan_because: All businesses have a responsibility towards the society that provides the operational environment. At Agile Utilities we accept that responsibility by contributing through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: Agile Utilities invests in New Zealand based companies.

lender.name: Maggy
lender.loan_because: it makes so much sense.

lender.name: Bhargav
lender.loan_because: it's so easy it'd be a crime not to!
